pkgmetadata.longdescription: # justmltoolsThis Python package is a library for recurring tasks in machine learning projects.It provides the following features:* standardized path layout for machine learning input and output data* easy data transfer between a local file system and an [MLflow repository](https://www.mlflow.org/)* easy data transfer between a local file system and an [AWS S3 bucket](https://aws.amazon.com/s3/)* easy data transfer from a GitLab repository to the local file system## InstallationFrom [PyPi](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/justmltools/):```pip3 install justmltools```## DocumentationFind documentation on when and how to use justmltools in the [Wiki](https://github.com/BigNerd/justmltools/wiki).
